Class Player

extends java.lang.Object
    This is a class built to represent a Player.

        Player constructor that contains all necessary info about a given player within the game
        Parameters:
        estOwned - a Map object containing the Player's owned Establishments
        landmarks - an array containing the game's Landmarks
        coinCount - an integer representing the Player's total coins
        playerNumber - an integer representing the Player's number
